RawLine: HEART_04004_Tip3,<color=#EFD8B0>內力低於 <color=#33ff33>{0:0.00}%</color> 時，內力恢復量增加 30%；內力高於 <color=#33ff33>{1:0.00}%</color> 時，傷害增加30%。</color>,<color=#EFD8B0>内力低于 <color=#33ff33>{0:0.00}%</color> 时，内力恢复量增加 30%；内力高于 <color=#33ff33>{1:0.00}%</color> 时，伤害增加30%。</color>

Items.r: <color=#EFD8B0>內力低於 <color=#33ff33>{0:0.00}%</color> 時，內力恢復量增加 30%；內力高於 <color=#33ff33>{1:0.00}%</color> 時，傷害增加30%。</color>
Items.c: 內力低於 <0:0.00>% 時,內力恢復量增加 30%；內力高於 <1:0.00>% 時,傷害增加30%。
Items.mt: If internal power is lower than <0:0.00>%, internal power recovery is increased by 30%; if internal power is higher than <1:0.00>%, damage is increased by 30%.
